Portfolio

At ADA we specialise in sophisticated and distinctive residential projects, from high quality individual houses to multi-unit apartment developments. ADA work encompasses a wide variety of architectural styles ranging from heritage restoration work to innovative contemporary buildings. Current commissions include residential, commercial, maritime, heritage restoration, refurbishment and interior fit-out projects.
